outputs.name: wea
outputs.description: A wea object from epw file.

inputs.name: _epw_file
inputs.description: Full path to an .epw weather file.

inputs.name: hoys_
inputs.description:
An optional list of hours of the year (numbers from 0 to 8759) for
which the Wea will be filtered. HOYs can be generated from the
"LB Analysis Period" component or they can be obtained through
other means like analysis of the values in an occupancy schedule.
By default, the Wea will be generated for the whole year.

inputs.name: timestep_
inputs.description:
An integer representing the timestep with which to make the 
WEA object.  Default is set to 1 for 1 step per hour of the year.

name: HB Wea From EPW
description:
Create a Wea object from an EPW file.
-
